name: auraltester
description: Aural testing software for music students

scripts.test: cd backend && ./gradlew build && cd ../frontend && npm run test:once
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && nodemon -e kt -x './gradlew bootrun'"
scripts.install: cd backend && ./gradlew build -x test && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: Kenny Hung
